ChangeList.Description: Added support for the application permission of `DataLossPrevention.Read.All` to get the data loss prevention policies for the user resource.
Added support for the delegated permission of `DataLossPrevention.Read` to get the data loss prevention policies for the user resource.
Added support for the application permission of `InformationProtectionConfig.Read.All` to get the information protection configurations for the user resource.
Added support for the delegated permission of `InformationProtectionConfig.Read` to get the information protection configurations for the user resource.
